title: Dragonstone armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dragonstone armour pieces are rewards from the Elven Crystal Chest. Aside from the bejewelled design, the stats of the dragonstone armour are the exact same as rune equipment. All pieces require level 40 Defence to equip, with the dragonstone platebody requiring the completion of Dragon Slayer I to wear.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dragonstone armour
A player wearing full dragonstone armour.

Dragonstone armour pieces are rewards from the Elven Crystal Chest. Aside from the bejewelled design, the stats of the dragonstone armour are the exact same as rune equipment. All pieces require level 40 Defence to equip, with the dragonstone platebody requiring the completion of Dragon Slayer I to wear.

This set can be stored in the armour case space of a costume room in a player-owned house. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.
